title: About Me
story: After 12 years in hospitality - progressing from waiter to restaurant manager and business owner - I developed strong discipline, leadership, and the ability to perform under pressure. After relocating to Spain in 2022, I consciously transitioned into web development, combining my technical background with a strong problem-solving mindset. Since early 2023, I have been studying and building projects with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and basic backend tools, alongside full-time work. While I am a junior developer, I bring reliability, business awareness, and the ability to learn quickly in real production environments. I am actively seeking a junior web developer role where I can contribute immediately and grow long-term within a team.
